Container.Name: Gamevault - Backend
Container.Overview: Backend for the self-hosted gaming platform for DRM-free games [br][br] [br][br] [b]This container requires a separate (remote) Postgres database connection.[/b]

Config.Name: Database Host
Config.Description: Hostname or IP of the database

Config.Name: Database User
Config.Description: Username to connect to the database

Config.Name: Database Password
Config.Description: Password to connect to the database

Config.Name: Server Admin Username
Config.Description: Grants Admin Role to account with this username upon registration

Config.Name: RAWG API Key
Config.Description: Insert your RAWG API Key here if you have one (https://rawg.io/login?forward=developer)

Config.Name: Images directory
Config.Description: Where your GameVault images are stored
